author: cactozdev
body:
# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
New-Item -ItemType File -Force $PROFILE.AllUsersAllHosts -Verbose
```

# Expected behavior

```none

```

# Actual behavior

```none
New-Item: Access to the path 'C:\Program Files\WindowsApps\Microsoft.PowerShellPreview_7.1.2.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe\profile.ps1' is denied.
```

# Environment data

```none
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.1.0-preview.2
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.1.0-preview.2
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.19613
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

Would like to add oh-my-posh and posh-git to profile.
Using Windows Terminal with elevated privileges.

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: /cc @SteveL-MSFT looks like an issue with the MSIX version.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as duplicate and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Unable to create profile.ps1
